name: Sagittarius A*
description:
Sagittarius A* is going to collapse and Earth will fall to the Nozick inside

You alone can stand between the Jentham cult and their evil plot to hasten its collapse

Delay the collapse by fragging their ships and increasing the black holes' mass, but collect enough scraps to power your nanobots by pressing E

You can use these to repair or rebuild your ship if you take too much damage

Press W to activate thrusters and LMB to aim and fire
